items.content_html: Asset Preloader is a lightweight JavaScript module for efficiently preloading assets in web applications. It supports images, videos, sounds, 3D models, and other file types with features such as event-driven progress tracking, retry mechanisms, batch loading, and customizable UI options.
items.title: motionharvest/asset-preloader: Asset Preloader is a lightweight JavaScript module for efficiently preloading assets in web applications. It supports images, videos, sounds, 3D models, and other file types with features such as event-driven progress tracking, retry mechanisms, batch loading, and customizable UI options.
